alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:09AM CDT until July 23 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR EASTERN CARROLL AND STEPHENSON COUNTIES... At 409 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Oneco to near Hitt, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Lena, Lanark, Milledgeville, Pearl City, Shannon, Cedarville, Davis, Chadwick, Dakota, German Valley, Winslow, Rock City, Ridott, Buena Vista, Rock Grove, Oneco, Orangeville, Eleroy and Hitt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
